languages.text: Существо оскверняет противников с каждым {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попаданием{/g} быстрее, чем другие слуги Нургла. После смерти цели поднимаются, становясь безвольными марионетками.
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: Существо оскверняет противников с каждым попаданием быстрее, чем другие слуги Нургла. После смерти цели поднимаются, становясь безвольными марионетками.
Существо оскверняет противников с каждым попаданием быстрее, чем другие слуги Нургла. После смерти цели поднимаются, становясь безвольными марионетками.

languages.text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.
languages.original_text: Существо оскверняет противников с каждым {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попаданием{/g} быстрее, чем другие слуги Нургла. После смерти цели поднимаются, становясь безвольными марионетками.

traits.locale_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each hit even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.
This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.
This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

languages.text: 与纳垢其他的仆人相比，此生物的每次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}会以更快的速度腐蚀敌人，令敌人死后成为没有意识的傀儡。
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的每次攻击会以更快的速度腐蚀敌人，令敌人死后成为没有意识的傀儡。

languages.text: この生物は他のナーグルのしもべよりもさらに速く、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}一撃{/g}ごとに敵を堕落させ、生物を死後蘇させ、無心の操り人形にする。
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: この生物は他のナーグルのしもべよりもさらに速く、一撃ごとに敵を堕落させ、死んだ生物をよみがえらせ、無心の操り人形にする。

languages.text: Esta criatura corrompe a sus enemigos con cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} a una velocidad aún mayor que otros sirvientes de Nurgle, haciendo que las criaturas se levanten póstumamente, convertidas en títeres sin mente.
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura corrompe a sus enemigos con cada golpe a una velocidad aún mayor que otros sirvientes de Nurgle, haciendo que las criaturas se levanten póstumamente, convertidas en títeres sin mente.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur korrumpiert ihre Feinde mit jedem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} noch schneller als andere Nurgle-Diener und lässt Kreaturen nach dem Tod als willenlose Puppen auferstehen.
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur korrumpiert ihre Feinde mit jedem Treffer noch schneller als andere Nurgle-Diener und lässt Kreaturen nach dem Tod als willenlose Puppen auferstehen.

languages.text: Cette créature corrompt ses ennemis à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}, encore plus rapidement que les autres serviteurs de Nurgle, et les transforme en marionnettes décérébrées après leur mort.
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature corrompt ses ennemis à chaque coup, encore plus rapidement que les autres serviteurs de Nurgle, et les transforme en marionnettes décérébrées après leur mort.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, düşmanlarını her {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşuyla{/g} diğer Nurgle hizmetkârlarına göre çok daha hızlı yozlaştırır ve yaratıkların öldükten sonra akılsız kuklalar olarak hortlamalarına sebep olur.
languages.original_text: This creature corrupts its enemies with each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} even faster than other Nurgle servants, making creatures arise as mindless puppets after death.
